help_command.all: ğŸ¨ | Help Are you so pathetic that you're asking me for help?) Pfff... Well okay. /help - A plea for help from a higher mind. /start - Start the bot / main menu /profile - Open the user profile. /add_me - Send a message with an active add to friends button. (group only) /promo (code) - Enter a promo code.
help_command.dev:
/stats - statistics for the bot.

/add_item item_id col user_id - add an item to the user.

/dungeon_delete - delete your dungeon.

/stats_100 - set charracteristics to all your dinosaurs by 100.

/link_promo (code) - link a button with a promo code to a message from the channel. (a response to the message is required)

/unlink_promo - remove the button (a response to the message is required)

/create_promo col | inf time | inf money - create a promo code.
